sentences.en: Actual humidity measurements in the boundary layers have been made with a microwave refractometer.
sentences.cn: 实际上已经用微波折射仪测定了边界层中的湿度.

sentences.en: I’ll heat it up in the microwave.
sentences.cn: 我来把它用微波炉热一热。

sentences.en: In a large microwave-proof dish, melt butter for 20 seconds.
sentences.cn: 让黄油在微波适用的大盘子里熔化20秒钟。

sentences.en: Its molecules can be agitated by microwave energy.
sentences.cn: 微波能量可以使其分子随之运动。

sentences.en: Just heat up the food in the microwave.
sentences.cn: 把食物放在微波炉里热热就行了。

sentences.en: Microwave spectroscopist have determined the rotational constants for many molecules.
sentences.cn: 微波波谱学家已经确定了许多分子的转动常数.

sentences.en: Mum has just won a microwave cooker.
sentences.cn: 妈妈刚刚赢得一台微波炉.

sentences.en: Reheat the soup in the microwave.
sentences.cn: 把汤放到微波炉里重新加热一下。

sentences.en: She has a microwave, but uses it mainly for defrosting bread.
sentences.cn: 她有个微波炉，不过主要用来解冻面包。

sentences.en: Steam or microwave the vegetables until tender.
sentences.cn: 蒸或者用微波炉加热蔬菜，直至蔬菜变软。

sentences.en: The electronmagnetic wave is produced by microwave tubes called klystrons.
sentences.cn: 电磁波是由一种称为速调管的微波电子管产生的.

sentences.en: The experimental study of molecular rotation is called microwave spectroscopy.
sentences.cn: 分子转动的实验研究被称为微波波谱学.

sentences.en: The microwave beeps to let you know when it has finished.
sentences.cn: 微波炉烹饪完毕时会发出哔哔声提醒你。

sentences.en: The microwave will bleep when your meal is ready.
sentences.cn: 烹调结束时，微波炉会发出哔哔的声音。

sentences.en: Vicky Brown arrived home to find the men disconnecting her microwave.
sentences.cn: 维基·布朗到家时发现那些人正在断开她微波炉的开关。

sentences.en: We cooked the fish in the microwave oven.
